text: Anand Singh Dangi is a member of the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the Indian National Congress representing the Meham Vidhan sabha Constituency in Haryana.I cannot shut people's mouths. Judge me by my performance: Banarsi Das Gupta == References == Category:Living people Category:Members of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:Janata Dal politicians Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Haryana Category:People from Jind Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Anand Singh Dangi
